entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
